name: dinos/dinosaurName
doc: The formal name given to the dinosaur.

name: dinos/englishTranslation
doc: The english language translation of the dinosaur's name.

name: dinos/period
doc: The period in time in which the dinosaur lived.

name: dinos/taxonomy
doc: The taxonomy of the specific dinosaur.

name: dinos/link
doc: the URI to the dinosaurs info page.
